name: Gloss Monogram
description:
Single initial charms, embossed over a matte black gloss finish.
Enter "MGM20" at checkout to receive a 20% discount on all Monogram Charms when you order 3 or more items!
return to home

name: Red Awareness Combo
description: Introducing our Red Awareness Ribbon Combo which supports research for AIDS/HIV, Cardiovascular disease, Congenital Heart Disease, Congestive Heart Failure and Stroke. This month, a portion of proceeds go to the Elizabeth Glazer Pediatric AIDS Foundation.

name: Red Awareness Ribbon
description: Introducing our Red Awareness Ribbon which supports research for AIDS/HIV, Cardiovascular disease, Congenital Heart Disease, Congestive Heart Failure and Stroke. This month, a portion of proceeds go to the Elizabeth Glazer Pediatric AIDS Foundation.

name: Snowman Charm
description: Let it snow! This snowman is anything but 'Frosty' with his gold accents and red crystal background. Bring some holiday cheer to your stethoscope!

name: Cat Charm
description: "Meow" to all of our cat lovers! Introducing our new Cat Charm...sparkly and GOLD!

name: Purple Ribbon Awareness Combo
description: A Purple Ribbon is worn to raise awareness for various causes including pancreatic cancer, cystic fibrosis, lupus, thyroid disease, Alzheimer's , colitis, ADHD, fibromyalgia, and more. This month we are recognizing Pancreatic Cancer Awareness. Help support those families and individuals with pancreatic cancer and advocate for research. A portion of proceeds will go to Pancreatic Cancer Action Network and the Sol Goldman Pancreatic Research Center.

name: Purple Ribbon
description: A Purple Ribbon is worn to raise awareness for various causes including: pancreatic cancer, cystic fibrosis, lupus, thyroid disease, Alzheimer's , colitis, ADHD, fibromyalgia, and more.

name: Jack-O-Lantern Charm
description: Boo! Show off our Jackolantern Charm in time for the holidays!

name: Breast Cancer Awareness Combo
description: A portion of proceeds from each Breast Cancer Awareness combo will be donated to the Breast Cancer Research Foundation.

name: Childhood Cancer Awareness Combo
description: Go Gold! Let's show our support for children and adolescents with cancer and their families by supporting research leading to a cure. A portion of sales will go to the St. Jude Children's Research Hospitals.

name: Gold Charm
description: Our brand-new, vibrant and beautiful Gold Charm. Turn heads with this beautiful piece!

name: Gift Certificates
description: Gift Certificates are now available! Click Here to visit our Gift Certificate page and send someone a very special gift! Purchasing a certificate has never been easier! After checking out through Paypal, you will be given the option to either have your new Gift Certificate emailed to you or printed out. A Paypal account is required to redeem a gift certificate. Paypal is the most secure and trusted paymant platform on the web, and signing up for an account is absolutely FREE! Click Here for more information. A Paypal account is NOT REQUIRED to purchase a gift certificate and send someone a gift!

name: Lucky Charm
description: Our Three Leaf Clover charm celebrates happiness and luck!

name: Bladder Cancer Awareness Combo
description: Support awareness of bladder cancer with this specially priced combo. Featuring a Plum and Blue Charm, this combo boldly stands on its own or creates a great contrast with our lighter colors! Proceeds will be donated to the American Cancer Society.

name: Plum Charm
description: They say purple is the color of royalty...show your style!

name: Paw Charm
description: Let's support our local vets and the furry friends we love!

name: Bright Yellow
description: Solid color charm. Mix and match with other colors to create a unique look all your own! return to home

name: Stroke Awareness Combo
description: Every 40 seconds, someone in the United States has a stroke. Support National Stroke Awareness Month to increase public awareness of life saving stroke information in an effort to conquer it. A portion of proceeds are donated to the American Stroke Association.

name: Stars & Stripes Charm
description: Celebrate Independence Day with your own CharMED Stars & Stripes Charm!

name: Peace Charm
description: Celebrate Love, Life and Peace!

name: Fleur de Lis Charm
description: Give the male medical professional in your life something special!

name: Autism Awareness Combo
description: Show your support for families and people living with autism. These bright primary colors represent the hope and diversity of the many people living with autism. A Portion of the proceeds are donated to the autism society.

name: Star Charm
description: A silver plated enamel star with sky blue crystal background, because everyone's a star in their own way. Get one for your self or for the shining star in your life!

name: Pink Ribbon - new design!
description: Show your support for the fight against breast cancer with this specially made charm! 5% of proceeds will be donated to the National Cancer Society. This newly redesigned charm features a carefully crafted ribbon placed among an ice colored backing. return to home

name: Cancer Control Combo
description: During National Cancer Control Month this April, we remember those we have lost, support those fighting this disease, and recommit to progress toward effective cancer control. Educate and Celebrate! Proceeds to go to American Cancer Society

name: MS Awareness Combo
description: Help support MS treatment and awareness by purchasing this special edition Tangerine and Iridescent Charm combo! Proceeds go to the National MS Society.

name: Colon Cancer Awareness Combo
description: Show your support for Colorectal Cancer Awareness! A portion of sales will go to the American Cancer Society.  This limited edition March combo is available for only $15.99!

name: American Heart Month Combo
description: Show your support for American Heart Month by wearing this stylish combo of charms! Includes the limited edition LOVE Charm. 5% of proceeds will be donated to the American Heart Association. return to home

name: Cervical Cancer Awareness (pair)
description: Show your support for cervical cancer awareness with this stylish combination of charms! 5% of proceeds will be donated to the American Cancer Society.

description: Love your patients, Love your friends, Love yourself! return to home
